tooltip.tombraider.survivor_pickaxe.tool:
Sturdy, sharp, & built for survival. 
Lara’s climbing pickaxe isn’t just for scaling cliffs—it’s a lifeline in the heat of adventure.
tooltip.tombraider.excalibur.tooltip: An artifact of immense power, said to be used by monarchs & nobles in their ascension to power.
item.tombraider.tombraider_ost_music_dis: Tomb Raider OST - By Nathan McCree
